algorithm_technique: Iterate through the street, placing buckets greedily to feed hamsters from left to right.
problem_summary_simple: Place minimum food buckets to feed all hamsters, each needing a bucket to its left or right.
problem_summary_technical: Greedily places buckets at the first available empty spot to satisfy the leftmost hungry hamster.
key_insights: A greedy approach works: when a hamster is encountered, try to place a bucket to its right first.
If a bucket cannot be placed to the right, try to place it to the left.
If a hamster cannot be fed (no empty spots nearby), it's impossible, return -1.
